docs.lead_paragraph: Is the old wives’ tale true? Are boys more likely to cause a difficult pregnancy?

headline.main: The Claim: Birth Complications Are More Likely With Boys.
headline.print_headline: Birth complications are more likely with boys.

docs.snippet: Is the old wives’ tale true? Are boys more likely to cause a difficult pregnancy?

docs.lead_paragraph: Levi Johnston "breaks his silence," according to a headline on the Web site of the "Tyra Show."

headline.main: Palin Isn't Happy About Today's 'Tyra Show'

docs.abstract: Gov. Sarah Palin criticized the father of her grandson, Levi Johnston, after he appeared on The Tyra Banks Show.
docs.snippet: Gov. Sarah Palin criticized the father of her grandson, Levi Johnston, after he appeared on The Tyra Banks Show.

docs.lead_paragraph: On Oct. 21, 1960, as "West Side Story" was playing on Broadway, a real blood feud was playing out at a youth dance and on the streets of Spanish Harlem between two rival gangs called the Viceroys and the Dragons.
docs.abstract: Also in the Morning Buzz: a union endorsement for Mayor Bloomberg, overspending on school contracts and more headlines from local papers.
docs.snippet: Also in the Morning Buzz: a union endorsement for Mayor Bloomberg, overspending on school contracts and more headlines from local papers.

docs.lead_paragraph: The word “pregnant,” once verboten on prime-time television, is now so common that an at-home fertility test will soon be advertised on TV.

headline.main: Once a Seldom-Heard Word, Pregnancy Is Now in the Spotlight
headline.print_headline: Once a Seldom-Heard Word, Pregnancy Is Now in the Spotlight

docs.snippet: The word “pregnant,” once verboten on prime-time television, is now so common that an at-home fertility test will soon be advertised on TV.

docs.lead_paragraph: Republicans are threatening to filibuster the confirmations of two of President Obama’s choices for senior Justice Department posts.

headline.main: Storm Clouds Gather Over Obama Nominees
headline.print_headline: In Senate Judiciary Wars, G.O.P. Struggles With Role

docs.snippet: Republicans are threatening to filibuster the confirmations of two of President Obama’s choices for senior Justice Department posts.
